attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Pub Trade is struggling enough and needs a boost. Pubs cannot compete with theMulitples that are able to seel alcohol as LOSS LEADERS. Pubs will soon no longer be able to run Promotions, but this will not be relevant to the Supermarkets
Sign the petition to STOP the Supermarkets selling alcohol at cheap prices in mass bulk. LIMITS must be put on these promotions if the Supermarkets still insist on selling Alcohol below cost price

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
